name: aliexpress.solution.batch.product.price.update
description: batch product price update operation for oversea sellers

requestParams.name: mutiple_product_update_list
requestParams.description: The product list, in which the price needs to be updated. Maximum length:20

subParams.name: multiple_sku_update_list
subParams.description: The sku list, in which the inventory needs to be updated within the same product id

subParams.name: discount_price
subParams.description: discount_price of an sku. If not set, the discount_price will be erased.

subParams.name: price_type
subParams.description: Currently supporting only absolute. Please test carefully before uploading products.

subParams.name: ship_to_country
subParams.description: Currently supporting RU US CA ES FR UK NL IL BR CL AU UA BY JP TH SG KR ID MY PH VN IT DE SA AE PL TR

subParams.name: sku_price_by_country_list
subParams.description: Sku price list under the same ship_to_country

subParams.name: price
subParams.description: Value of price configuration. If the price of a specific country is set, it must be greater than or equal to 70% of the original sku price in multiple_sku_update_list

subParams.name: discount_price
subParams.description: Value of discount_price for each country

responseParams.name: update_error_code
responseParams.description: When success equals false, indicating the error code

responseParams.name: update_error_message
responseParams.description: When success equals false, indicating the error message

responseParams.name: update_success
responseParams.description: Indicates the update result is successful or not. Only all the products in mutiple_product_update_list have been updated successfully will make the success to be true, otherwise false.
